author: IGN
description:
The first ever Creature Feature will include updates, announcements, and shenanigans from all Creature label studios. You will see brand new game announcements, new content for some of your favorite games, and a few surprises along the way. 

Creature Feature airs on May 19 at 9am PT 

#IGN
title: Creature Feature 2025

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Guardian Character Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Elden Ring Nightreign, a standalone roguelike adventure within the world of Elden Ring developed by FromSoftware. Players will be able to use Guardian, a formidable opponent with an eagle for a body and a shield at the ready. Get the rundown on the moveset, abilities, and gameplay from Guardian, coming to Elden Ring Nightreign on May 30 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#EldenRing #Guardian #Gaming
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Official Guardian Character Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Red Dead Redemption 2 could be getting a Nintendo Switch 2 port, according to sources close to Rockstar Games. The port would be the first for a Nintendo console, with the first Red Dead Redemption getting a Switch 1 port in 2023, 13 years after it first debuted on the PS3 and Xbox 360. The RDR2 Switch 2 port would also coincide with a current-gen PS5/Series X|S port. In other news, Fortnite's Star Wars crossover event just dropped an AI-powered Darth Vader that reacts to what you say to it. And of course, gamers have found a way to make Vader make some NSFW words (which was quickly patched out). And finally, Hideo Kojima doesn't want mortality to stop him from releasing games. He's setting up a plan to leave his studio, Kojima Productions, with some unfinished game ideas in the event of his passing.

#IGN #Gaming #NintendoSwitch2
title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Rumored To Get Switch 2 Version and Next-Gen Upgrade - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
SPOILERS: Take a look at the 'Distraction' Clip for Andor Season 2, the live-action series about the journey of Cassian Andor and The Rebellion leading into Star Wars: Rogue One distributed by Disney Plus. Kleya must make a loud and disruptive distraction to lure the Imperial Stormtroopers away so she can make the ultimate sacrifice in the name of the Rebellion. Andor Season 2 is streaming now on Disney Plus.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events of
title: Andor Season 2 - Official 'Distraction' Clip (2025) Elizabeth Dulau

author: IGN
description:
NTE Containment Test recruitment begins now!

Welcome to Heathreau, Appraiser!
The life of an anomaly hunter isn't easy—so stay sharp and watch out for the strange and unusual.
Feeling a bit lost starting out? Don't worry—our friends at Sterry Express are always ready to lend a hand.

You'll get the hang of containment in no time. Keep your eyes open—and don't miss the Nexus!
title: Neverness to Everness - Official Closed Beta Trailer | Containment Begins Now!

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gameplay Teaser Trailer #2 for MindsEye, a third-person action-adventure game developed by Build A Rocket Boy. Players can check out some open-world driving gameplay with some dialogue that hints at the underlying plot of the game. MindsEye is launching on June 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: MindsEye - Official Gameplay Teaser #2

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'The Trooper' Schools of the Imperium Overview Trailer for Dune: Awakening, an upcoming open-world survival MMO developed by Funcom. Players can get the rundown on the tactics, abilities, and gameplay of The Trooper, soldiers of the army of a given House or House Guard in the world of Dune: Awakening. The Trooper is able to wield an arsenal of ranged weaponry with expert precision and deploy powerful tech with explosives and Holzman suspensor fields. Learn more about The Trooper in Dune: Awakening, launching on June 10 for PC (Steam).

#DuneAwakening #TheTrooper #Gaming
title: Dune: Awakening - Official 'The Trooper' Schools of the Imperium Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ever wondered what Doom: The Dark Ages looked like while running on a Steam Deck OLED? How about running it at it's lowest possible settings and then at it's absolute highest settings? It'll definitely rip and tear though your battery life thats for sure. 
Gameplay captured on a Steam Deck OLED 

00:00 - Low Settings
21:41 - Ultra Nightmare Settings
title: Doom: The Dark Ages Steam Deck Gameplay - Lowest & Highest Settings

description:
Take a look at the General Grievous Reveal Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person battle royale shooter developed by Epic Games. Players can fight as the legendary General Grievous through an unlock in the Star Wars Battle Pass, available now.

#Fortnite #GeneralGrievous #Gaming
title: Fortnite - Official General Grievous Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Survive the Fall, the upcoming post-meteor-strike apocalypse open-world survival game played from an old-school top-down perspective, is launching on PC (via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG) on May 22. Expect exploration, combat, stealth, base management, and more. Check out the launch trailer and wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579340/Survive_the_Fall/
title: Survive the Fall - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Killer Instinct Gold Trailer for the latest update to Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack: Nintendo 64, the online service for Nintendo Switch, bringing retro games to modern hardware developed by Rare. Players can now experience the classic fighting game with 10 killer fighters across multiple game modes such as Arcade, Team, or Tournament Mode. Hone skills in Training mode to master thousands of moves and killer Combos. Killer Instinct Gold is available now in the Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack: Nintendo 64 for Nintendo Switch.

#KillerInstinctGold #NintendoSwitchOnline #Gaming
title: Killer Instinct Gold - Official Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack: Nintendo 64 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! This week we speak with Nintendo Voice Chat host Logan Plant about visiting the new Nintendo Store in San Francisco, and interviewing Nintendo of America President Doug Bowser. In that interview, Bowser explained the benefit of having game-key cards that don't actually have the game on them, and we discuss how Nintendo is setting up the Switch 2 for success in its first year. Plus we have last week's poll results.
And don't forget to secure your tickets to IGN Live, our second annual in-person event being held in downtown Los Angeles next month. Get tickets at ign.com/live and use promo code NGCW for a discount.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Nintendo Says Physical Games Are Still Key (Cards) - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Now that Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 has been out for a while, we’ve been experimenting with more and more optimal builds. Thanks to Tenkiei over at sister-site Maxroll (whose build guide and YouTube channel are both linked below), we have a new endgame nuke build for Maelle that didn’t get hit too hard by the recent patches. This will give the broad strokes of the build and go over the most important points, but if you want an exhaustive breakdown for max optimization, make sure you check out the original guide page.

Tenkiei’s Burn Stack Nuke Guide:
https://maxroll.gg/clair-obscur-expedition-33/guides/endgame-burn-stacking-build-expert-and-ng

Tenkiei’s Burn Stack Nuke Planner Page:
https://maxroll.gg/clair-obscur-expedition-33/planner?profile=qr1j4009

Tenkiei’s YT Channel:
http://www.youtube.com/@Tenkiei

Timecodes:
00:00 - Intro
00:45 - Build Goal
01:05 - Verso Setup
02:45 - Maelle Setup
04:24 - Sciel Setup
05:28 - Turn Order
06:55 - Outro & Example Fight

#IGN #Gaming
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 - Maelle Post-Nerf Nuke Build
